EmailGPT is a Chrome Extension that summarizes, organizes, and enhances Gmail threads to help users manage overwhelming email chains. It helps you:

âœ… Summarize entire conversations into concise highlights
âœ… Break down each message with repetitive content filtered out
âœ… Highlight action items and requests automatically
âœ… Suggest smart replies using AI integration

Stay informed, make decisions faster, and reply with confidence â€” all within Gmail.
